title: Elo Booster/Advertiser  found
body: I have screenshots of someone advertising ELO boosting right after a ranked game in Gold 5. Would like to send these to a Mod or Riot support but am unsure of how to embed them in a forum post or create the relevant report/ticket. Thank you.

replies.body: Just use the [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) category **I have a question > Game & Features > General Questions**. The ticket will be forwarded to the appropriate department. There will be an option to attach a document at the bottom of the ticket, or you can upload the image to another site (such as imgur or gyazo) and link the image URL in the ticket. Don't put it on the boards, because that isn't allowed.

I agree with DTN that [submitting a ticket](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M) would be the best option.  It wouldn't be safe to share links and information on malicious sites on a public forum, or put an unwanted spotlight on others.  Thanks for helping us keep the community safe!
